translation.en: [chuckles] Show me the tummy!
translation.ja: おなかを見せて

translation.en: -Good boy, Pugsley! -[whimpers]
translation.ja: いい子だ　パグスリー

translation.en: [Barney] Come on, boy. Let's go.
translation.ja: 行こう 〝求人 フェニックス･パーク〞 〝求人 フェニックス･パーク〞

translation.en: [woman on TV] Oh, it's Grandpa!
translation.ja: おじいちゃんが！

translation.en: [gasps] Is he dead?
translation.ja: 死んでる？

translation.en: [man on TV] No, miss, he's just… frozen.
translation.ja: 固まってるだけだ

translation.en: [woman] At his own birthday party too.
translation.ja: おじいちゃんの誕生日 おじいちゃんの誕生日 〝求人〞

translation.en: -"His big special day." -[woman] His big special day.
translation.ja: 特別な日よ

translation.en: [man] And he seemed so happy in the photographs.
translation.ja: おじいちゃんは写真の中

translation.en: Wait, that's it.
translation.ja: そうか！

translation.en: Photographs capture the soul of the subject.
translation.ja: 中身を写真に 閉じ込められたのね

translation.en: The only question is, how are we gonna get Grandpa…
translation.ja: どうすればおじいちゃんを 体の中に戻(もど)せる？

translation.en: -[sinister music playing] -…back in Grandpa!
translation.ja: どうすればおじいちゃんを 体の中に戻(もど)せる？ 「デッド･エンド」

translation.en: Okay, Mom. Ask me what my biggest weakness is.
translation.ja: ママ 僕(ぼく)の弱点は？

translation.en: Oily skin?
translation.ja: ニキビ肌(はだ)？

translation.en: I'm serious. I was gonna go with something like "paralyzing fear of confrontation."
translation.ja: ふざけないでよ 恐怖(きょうふ)に打ち勝ちたいんだ

translation.en: Uh, sweetie, why do you wanna know your biggest weakness?
translation.ja: 一体どうしたの？

translation.en: My job interview at Phoenix Parks.
translation.ja: 今夜は フェニックス･パークの面接

translation.en: Tonight. I told you.
translation.ja: 今夜は フェニックス･パークの面接 言ったよね

translation.en: Uh, but Grammy Gram's coming for dinner. I made cheese-less mac and cheese.
translation.ja: チーズ抜(ぬ)きチーズパスタで おばあちゃんと夕食よ

translation.en: Ugh, Mom, did you tell her I would be there?
translation.ja: “僕(ぼく)も一緒(いっしょ)”と伝えた？

translation.en: Yeah, of course.
translation.ja: ええ もちろん

translation.en: Did you tell her Barney would be there?
translation.ja: “バーニーが一緒(いっしょ)”と？

translation.en: Oh, come on, sweetie, there's a lot she doesn't understand.
translation.ja: おばあちゃんは 分からず屋なの

translation.en: [scoffs] She's not the only one.
translation.ja: みんな同じだ

translation.en: -[whimpers] -[chuckles] Sorry, buddy, you can't come.
translation.ja: ごめん 仕事をもらえたら 一緒(いっしょ)に家を出て暮らそう

translation.en: But if I get this job, we can get a place of our own.
translation.ja: 仕事をもらえたら 一緒(いっしょ)に家を出て暮らそう

translation.en: Just you and me. No Mom, no Dad, [scoffs] no Grammy Gram.
translation.ja: 仕事をもらえたら 一緒(いっしょ)に家を出て暮らそう 両親もおばあちゃんもなし

translation.en: Okay, fine. Come on.
translation.ja: 分かった　おいで

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, stop it.
translation.ja: やめろよ

translation.en: Oh, my precious girl! Going to her first job interview!
translation.ja: ママの宝物が 初めて仕事の面接に行くのね

translation.en: -[sniffling] -Mom!
translation.ja: ママったら

translation.en: Call me before you go in.
translation.ja: 面接の前と後に知らせて

translation.en: And after. And maybe during too?
translation.ja: 面接の前と後に知らせて 面接中にもね

translation.en: [chuckling] Bye, Mom.
translation.ja: いってきます

translation.en: [over phone] Just checking you've got your phone.
translation.ja: 携帯(けいたい)は持ったわね

translation.en: If you whizz in my bag again, I'm sending you right back home, young man.
translation.ja: また中でオシッコしたな

translation.en: [Norma] Oh, jeez. Strange dude. Talking to himself.
translation.ja: 変な人 独り言を言ってる

translation.en: Okay, maybe Mom was right and I should never go outside.
translation.ja: ママの言うとおり―

translation.en: Or at least I think that's what she was trying to say.
translation.ja: ずっと家にいればよかった

translation.en: Uh… You're the one talking to yourself, Norma.
translation.ja: ノーマ 独り言？

translation.en: [grunting] How do you know my name?
translation.ja: なぜ私の名前を？

translation.en: -Whoa! It's me, Barney. -Uh, I'm bad with names.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく) バーニーだよ 覚えてない

translation.en: We literally live on the same street. Same school. We're lab partners!
translation.ja: 近所の元同級生 授業でペアを組んだ

translation.en: I'm bad with… faces.
translation.ja: 覚えてない 顔もね

translation.en: Hello, I'm Pauline Phoenix.
translation.ja: こんにちは ポリーン･フェニックスよ

translation.en: You know, in just a few ticks, we'll be at my very own theme park.
translation.ja: あとほんの少しで 私のテーマパークに着くわ

translation.en: Thank you. Where the fun just never stops, except November through to March.
translation.ja: 楽しいことでいっぱいよ 11月から３月以外はね

translation.en: We've got five zones for you all to enjoy, based on my movies, music and TV shows.
translation.ja: 園内の５つのゾーンは 私の映画や音楽 テレビ番組に基(もと)づいてるの

translation.en: Remember, consuming outside food and drink is a big no-no.
translation.ja: 飲食物の持ち込(こ)みは 絶対にダメよ

translation.en: And if you see anything that seems just a little outta sorts,
translation.ja: ビックリするような―

translation.en: you know, anything suspicious or supernatural at all,
translation.ja: 怪(あや)しいものや不思議なものを 見たら…

translation.en: [chuckling] well, just keep it to yourself, darlin'.
translation.ja: 内緒(ないしょ)にしておいてね

translation.en: -Did you see that? -Yeah, we're almost there.
translation.ja: 今の見た？ もうすぐよ

translation.en: [Pauline over speakers] Thank you for visiting Phoenix Parks.
translation.ja: ようこそ フェニックス･パークへ

translation.en: -[breathes deeply] -[Pauline] Y'all enjoy yourselves! Or else. I hope y'all come back soon.
translation.ja: どうぞ楽しんで 無事に戻(もど)れますように

translation.en: Safe trip. Take care now. Don't sue. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 気をつけて 安全に 訴訟(そしょう)はやめてね

translation.en: Okay, you can stop following me now, creep.
translation.ja: 後をつけないで　キモい

translation.en: I'm not following you. And I'm not a creep.
translation.ja: つけてないしキモくない

translation.en: -I've got a job interview down here. -Wait.
translation.ja: 仕事の面接だよ 待って

translation.en: "Opportunity at Phoenix Parks, Dead End Attraction."
translation.ja: “アトラクション デッド･エンドで―”

translation.en: "Please arrive at sundown."
translation.ja: “日没に面接”

translation.en: [both] "Rare opening for the one perfect candidate."
translation.ja: “完璧(かんぺき)な人材１名を求む”

translation.en: -Well, good luck. -Thanks!
translation.ja: がんばって どうも

translation.en: Wait!
translation.ja: 待って

translation.en: -Okay. You ready, boy? -[barks]
translation.ja: よし いくぞ

translation.en: Torpe-dog!
translation.ja: 犬爆弾(ばくだん)！

translation.en: -[barks] -Good boy.
translation.ja: いい子だ

translation.en: [gasps] What?
translation.ja: いつの間に前へ？

translation.en: -How did that happen? -I took the staff line.
translation.ja: いつの間に前へ？ スタッフ通路が

translation.en: Oh, my ghosts! This is so cool.
translation.ja: とっても驚き！ 最高にクール！

translation.en: No one's been in here for a year. Not since the Jennifer Swan incident.
translation.ja: ジェニファー･スワン事件で ここは閉鎖された

translation.en: Jennifer Swan?
translation.ja: ジェニファー･スワン？

translation.en: It was on a night like tonight. Except it was raining. And I think it was a Thursday morning, actually.
translation.ja: あれは雨が降る夜だった 正確には木曜の未明

translation.en: One of the parks' Pauline impersonators entered Dead End…
translation.ja: ポリーンのそっくりさんが デッド･エンドに入り―

translation.en: -[sinister music playing] -…and never came out!
translation.ja: 戻(もど)らなかった

translation.en: She died? In here?
translation.ja: ここで死んだの？

translation.en: Whoa! No, I just said she didn't come out.
translation.ja: 違(ちが)うよ　出てこなかった

translation.en: She just "disappeared."
translation.ja: “消えた”ってこと

translation.en: -I can't believe you didn't know. -[sniffing]
translation.ja: 知らないの？

translation.en: [Barney] All right.
translation.ja: まあね

translation.en: Don't you know anything about Dead End? I'm clearly the better candidate for this job.
translation.ja: この分だと採用されるのは 私だね

translation.en: That stuff doesn't matter. It's about being a responsible employee.
translation.ja: 大事なのは 知識より責任感だよ

translation.en: Your dog is whizzing on the furniture.
translation.ja: 犬がオシッコを

translation.en: [gasps] Pugs… Pugsley! No!
translation.ja: パグスリー ダメだ

translation.en: [Norma] Go on. Ask me anything.
translation.ja: 何でも質問して

translation.en: Uh, how do you get dog pee out of cobwebs?
translation.ja: オシッコは消せる？

translation.en: About Pauline! Dead End. This park.
translation.ja: ポリーンや デッド･エンド関連よ

translation.en: I know everything. Every cast member. Every episode.
translation.ja: 出演者にエピソード―

translation.en: Every single nut and bolt of this whole darn attraction.
translation.ja: このアトラクションを 知り尽くしてる

translation.en: Who's that?
translation.ja: あれは誰(だれ)？

translation.en: [chuckles] Easy, that's old Charlie Bonaparte. -Full name Charles… -[yelps]
translation.ja: チャールズ･ボナパルトは…

translation.en: Welcome, mortals.
translation.ja: ようこそ 人間

translation.en: [Pauline over speakers] Your beautiful photograph is ready to collect.
translation.ja: ステキな写真ができています

translation.en: [Norma] …at the full moon. AKA, he's a werewolf.
translation.ja: …満月の夜は狼(おおかみ)男になる

translation.en: Although, they didn't establish that… Are you even listening?
translation.ja: シーズン前は… 聞いてる？

translation.en: Sitting around on the job? Glad I'm not his boss. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 座(すわ)ってるなんて やる気あるの？

translation.en: Oh, hi. I'm Norma Khan. I'm here for the job opportunity…
translation.ja: ノーマ･カーンです 面接に来ました

translation.en: [pants] Hi. And I'm Barney.
translation.ja: どうも バーニーです

translation.en: And you must be the manager. Love the costume.
translation.ja: マネジャーさん？ 衣装(いしょう)がステキ

translation.en: And you two must be the offerings. I didn't know there'd be a choice.
translation.ja: 志願者は２人だね どちらかを選べる

translation.en: There isn't. Uh, here's my resume, references…
translation.ja: 私に決めて これが履歴(りれき)書と アトラクション訪問の記録

translation.en: [Norma] …and proof of visits to Dead End… -[yawns] -[Norma] …ages seven through 15.
translation.ja: これが履歴(りれき)書と アトラクション訪問の記録

translation.en: And if that doesn't convince you,
translation.ja: これもあります

translation.en: take a look at this letter from the very desk of Pauline's
translation.ja: これもあります 〝推薦(すいせん)状〞 〝推薦(すいせん)状〞 〝推薦(すいせん)状〞 ポリーン･フェニックスの 秘書見習いがくれた

translation.en: [hesitates] secretary's intern.
translation.ja: 〝推薦(すいせん)状〞 ポリーン･フェニックスの 秘書見習いがくれた

translation.en: -Who's Pauline Phoenix? -[gasps]
translation.ja: ポリーンって誰(だれ)？

translation.en: And what about you, freckles?
translation.ja: ソバカス君は？

translation.en: What makes you think you'd be a good flesh vessel?
translation.ja: 自分の肉体の長所はどこ？

translation.en: Mmm, flesh?
translation.ja: 肉だ

translation.en: Perfect. Let's go.
translation.ja: 完璧(かんぺき)だね

translation.en: What? Uh, no fair!
translation.ja: フェアじゃないよ

translation.en: All right, folks, get ready. He's on his way.
translation.ja: 準備はいい？　お出ましだよ

translation.en: Um, Norma? I don't think this is what we think it is.
translation.ja: ノーマ 何だか話が違(ちが)うよ

translation.en: Ugh! I know! Group interview. They could've warned us.
translation.ja: グループ面接だなんて 聞いてない

translation.en: Uh, excuse me! Does this job have any benefits?
translation.ja: 従業員向けサービスは？

translation.en: Uh, wings, blood made of fire, immortality.
translation.ja: 翼(つばさ)と火の血 それと不死も

translation.en: -[Norma] Okay, but what about dental? -[elevator thuds]
translation.ja: 歯科保険は？

translation.en: -[screams] Norma? Norma! -Excuse me? I'm talking to you.
translation.ja: 聞いてます？ ノーマ

translation.en: -You haven't answered my question. -Look!
translation.ja: 質問に答えて

translation.en: Do you mind?
translation.ja: 静かに

translation.en: Here he comes! [laughs] The demon king's gonna love me for bringing two humans.
translation.ja: お着きだ！ ２人も連れてきたから 魔王(まおう)様は喜ぶよ

translation.en: Demon king? What episode was that in?
translation.ja: “魔王(まおう)”って第何話？

translation.en: This one!
translation.ja: これだ

translation.en: O great Temeluchus. It must be Two for Tuesday!
translation.ja: 偉大(いだい)なるテメルーカス様

translation.en: [chuckles] I got you not one, but two flesh vessels.
translation.ja: ２つの体をご用意しました

translation.en: I rescind my application. The job's yours!
translation.ja: やめとく　仕事はあなたに

translation.en: They'd both make excellent new bodies, Temeluchus.
translation.ja: どちらも最高の体です

translation.en: -Which shall it be? -[growls]
translation.ja: お好みは？

translation.en: Ip dip doo, the dog's got the flu,
translation.ja: どちらにしようかな

translation.en: the cat's got the chicken pox, so it's gonna be you!
translation.ja: 犬は風邪(かぜ) 猫(ねこ)は水ぼうそう 君に決定

translation.en: Good choice. Fleshy.
translation.ja: いい選択(せんたく)です

translation.en: [distorted] Pugsley!
translation.ja: パグスリー！

translation.en: Fellow demons, let us join hands, claws, tentacles.
translation.ja: 悪魔(あくま)たちよ 手とカギ爪(つめ) 触手(しょくしゅ)をつないで

translation.en: ♪ Seal the body up Seal the body up ♪
translation.ja: 体を封印(ふういん) 体を封印(ふういん)

translation.en: ♪ Pull, pull, smash, smash, smash! ♪
translation.ja: 引いて 引いて ３回 打ちつけろ

translation.en: Pugsley?
translation.ja: パグスリー？

translation.en: Oh, no! Pugsley!
translation.ja: パグスリー？ しっかり！

translation.en: Pugsley, come on, buddy! Open your eyes. Pugsley, please.
translation.ja: パグスリー？ しっかり！ 目を開けて パグスリー お願いだ

translation.en: Do not give orders to the great Temeluchus!
translation.ja: 偉大(いだい)なるテメルーカスに 命令するな

translation.en: Tremble, for Temeluchus lives again.
translation.ja: おののけ テメルーカスの復活だ

translation.en: I specifically requested no photographs.
translation.ja: “写真は撮るな”と言った

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, sorry about that.
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: But, uh, I was wondering,
translation.ja: でも私は体を２つ捧げて―

translation.en: since I provided two excellent vessels and fulfilled my side of the bargain,
translation.ja: でも私は体を２つ捧げて― 約束を果たしました

translation.en: you could lift my curse and let me go back home?
translation.ja: 呪(のろ)いを解き 家に帰してください

translation.en: Hmm. No!
translation.ja: ダメだ！

translation.en: I was specific.
translation.ja: はっきり伝えた

translation.en: Humans, tell me. Who is the king of this realm?
translation.ja: この国の王は誰(だれ)だ？

translation.en: -We don't have a king. -Your ruler. Your commander.
translation.ja: 王はいない では支配者は？

translation.en: I would very much like to eat them.
translation.ja: そいつを食べたい

translation.en: Oh, well, there's a little White House about 2,000 miles that way.
translation.ja: 3200キロ先の ホワイトハウスに

translation.en: Enough! I shall find and claim my own throne.
translation.ja: もういい 自分で王座を手に入れる

translation.en: Oh, no. Wait, sire. Wait, sire! Sire, wait.
translation.ja: ちょっと 魔王(まおう)様

translation.en: Ooh, what about me, please? What about me?
translation.ja: 待って　私はどうなります？

translation.en: [cries] I just wanna go home.
translation.ja: 家に帰りたい

translation.en: Norma, who are you calling? The dog pound?
translation.ja: ノーマ 誰(だれ)に電話を？

translation.en: No, my mom. She can take us home.
translation.ja: ママだよ　迎(むか)えを頼(たの)むの

translation.en: My dog is possessed by Temeluka… Teme…Temeloo…
translation.ja: 愛犬の体を乗っ取られた テメ… テメル… 悪魔(あくま)に

translation.en: -Uh, a demon! -Yeah. It possessed your dog, not us.
translation.ja: テメ… テメル… 悪魔(あくま)に 私たちでなく犬でよかった 逃(に)げよう

translation.en: -So let's escape while we still can. -[line ringing]
translation.ja: 私たちでなく犬でよかった 逃(に)げよう

translation.en: Pugsley's not just my dog. He's my family.
translation.ja: ただの犬じゃない　家族だ

translation.en: The only family that's always had my back. And I can't lose him.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)を支えてくれる愛犬を 見捨てられない

translation.en: [Swati over phone] Sweetie, how did it go? Did you get it?
translation.ja: ノーマ 結果は？ 〝ママ〞 採用された？

translation.en: -Oh, no, you didn't get it, did you? -[Barney] Pugsley! Pugsley!
translation.ja: ダメだったのね パグスリー！

translation.en: [Swati] Did you want me to come and have a word with them, maybe? -I will, my little blossom-- -Hmm.
translation.ja: ママと話したい？　いいわよ もし…

translation.en: What would Pauline do?
translation.ja: ポリーンなら？

translation.en: She'd save the dog and the park from any potential lawsuits.
translation.ja: 犬を救って パークを訴訟(そしょう)から守るはず

translation.en: -You! -Hi, hello. Yeah, Courtney. How ya doin'?
translation.ja: あなた やあ 私はコートニー

translation.en: How do we stop it?
translation.ja: どうすれば？

translation.en: [chuckles] You can't stop Temeluchus. He's already dead.
translation.ja: テメルーカスは死んでるから

translation.en: Which is why he needs a new vessel every few hundred years.
translation.ja: 数百年ごとに体を替(か)える

translation.en: So what are we talking? Salt circle? Holy water? Vacuum cleaner?
translation.ja: やめさせるには聖水？ 掃除機(そうじき)？

translation.en: Ugh! Well, I did the sealing spell. Temeluchus' soul is now in that dog for good.
translation.ja: テメルーカスは犬の体内に 封印(ふういん)されてる

translation.en: The only way to stop him is to kill the dog!
translation.ja: 犬を殺すしかないね

translation.en: That's not gonna happen.
translation.ja: それはダメ

translation.en: Or find some other vessel for him to possess. But the first option is way more fun.
translation.ja: 別の体と替(か)えるより 犬を殺す方が楽しいよ

translation.en: I specifically requested no photographs.
translation.ja: “写真は撮るな”と言った

translation.en: Photographs capture the soul of the subject.
translation.ja: 中身を写真に 閉じ込められたのね

translation.en: [panting] Pugsley!
translation.ja: パグスリー！

translation.en: [panting] Pugs?
translation.ja: パグスリー？

translation.en: Throne.
translation.ja: 〝キャメロット･ クリーク〞 王座があるのは―

translation.en: He's looking for a throne! Yes! To Camelot! [pants]
translation.ja: 〝キャメロット･ クリーク〞 王座があるのは― 王座があるのは― キャメロットだ！

translation.en: [pants] There you are!
translation.ja: いた

translation.en: Have you come to challenge me?
translation.ja: 私と戦う気か？

translation.en: No, I don't wanna fight you, Pugsley.
translation.ja: 戦いたくないよ　パグスリー

translation.en: Stop calling me that. Kneel before Temeluchus!
translation.ja: その名で呼ぶな テメルーカスの前に ひざまずけ

translation.en: There's a good boy. You know, your body was my first choice.
translation.ja: いい子だ 欲(ほ)しかったのは君の体だ

translation.en: Perhaps once I've exhausted this mighty vessel,
translation.ja: この体が衰(おとろ)えたら

translation.en: I'll move on to your strangely unwrinkled form.
translation.ja: 君の新鮮(しんせん)な肉体に替(か)える

translation.en: I've had many bodies over the years.
translation.ja: いろんな体を頂いたよ

translation.en: -This isn't even my first canine… -Psst. You need to take a photo.
translation.ja: 犬の体もな 写真を撮(と)って

translation.en: Yeah, Norma, I think I'll remember this moment.
translation.ja: その必要はない

translation.en: My parents met during the Haunted Wars…
translation.ja: 私の両親の出会いは…

translation.en: No! Photos capture the soul. You know, like in Episode 105,
translation.ja: 中身を写真に閉じ込める 第５話でポリーンの 祖父が固まった時みたいに

translation.en: in which Pauline finds the body of her grandfather petrified on the floor -after his birthday party. -Yeah, I get it.
translation.ja: 第５話でポリーンの 祖父が固まった時みたいに

translation.en: Just take the photo.
translation.ja: じゃ 君が撮(と)って

translation.en: [groans] But my mom says my phone is for emergencies only.
translation.ja: ママが“携帯(けいたい)は非常時用”と

translation.en: -What do you call this? -Okay, okay.
translation.ja: 今が非常時 分かった

translation.en: -[Temeluchus speaking indistinctly] -[Norma] Say cheese!
translation.ja: 撮(と)るよ　チーズ

translation.en: -[cell phone ringing] -No, no, no, no, no.
translation.ja: 〝着信：ママ〞 〝着信：ママ〞 ウソでしょ

translation.en: Huh?
translation.ja: ウソでしょ

translation.en: No photos!
translation.ja: 写真を撮るな！

translation.en: This is what I think of your pathetic toys. [laughs]
translation.ja: お前のオモチャなど こうだ

translation.en: Yeah? Well, I was due an upgrade anyway!
translation.ja: どうせ買い替(か)えようと

translation.en: [Temeluchus] Fool. You think you can outsmart me?
translation.ja: バカめ 私に勝てるとでも？

translation.en: Now it is your turn to be crushed to pieces!
translation.ja: 今度はお前を 粉々にしてやる

translation.en: Quick! Get in the log!
translation.ja: 早く乗って！

translation.en: If you want me, come and get me!
translation.ja: 体が欲(ほ)しい？　取ってみろ

translation.en: [yelps] Norma! Help!
translation.ja: ノーマ 助けて！

translation.en: I've got a plan! Just keep him busy till we get to the drop!
translation.ja: 落下地点まで注意を引いて

translation.en: Oh, don't worry, he's busy!
translation.ja: 大丈夫　夢中みたい

translation.en: [laughs] Nice try.
translation.ja: 惜(お)しかったな

translation.en: Get down!
translation.ja: 伏(ふ)せ！

translation.en: Wow.
translation.ja: やった！

translation.en: [gasps] Pugsley's fighting back from the inside.
translation.ja: パグスリーが中から反撃(はんげき)！

translation.en: What did you just do to me? Some tricksy spell?
translation.ja: くだらん呪文(じゅもん)で私を操(あやつ)る？

translation.en: Pugsley, sit!
translation.ja: パグスリー お座(すわ)り

translation.en: [groans] Witches? I knew it!
translation.ja: 魔法(まほう)使いだな

translation.en: [Norma] Doggie!
translation.ja: ワンちゃん！

translation.en: -Huh? -Fetch!
translation.ja: 取って！

translation.en: [splutters] I know your plan! -And it won't work! -[groans]
translation.ja: お前の作戦など お見通しだ

translation.en: Norma!
translation.ja: ノーマ！

translation.en: Any last words?
translation.ja: 言い残すことは？

translation.en: [grunts] Show me the tummy!
translation.ja: おなかを見せて！

translation.en: -[laughs] Oh, no! -Who's a good boy?
translation.ja: いい子だ

translation.en: -[Temeluchus laughs] -Who's a good boy?
translation.ja: おりこうさん

translation.en: -Oh! No! No! No, no! [laughing] -Let me get that.
translation.ja: やめろ！

translation.en: Who's a good boy?
translation.ja: よしよし

translation.en: -Come on, Norma! -[grunting] Trying!
translation.ja: ノーマ！ 今 やってる

translation.en: -[laughing] No! No! -That's it. Show me the tummy.
translation.ja: よせ！ おなかを見せて

translation.en: -[grunts] -Happy puppy. Good boy. Norma. Norma, now!
translation.ja: いい子 ノーマ 今だ！

translation.en: [Barney] Pugsley?
translation.ja: パグスリー？

translation.en: Pugsley, wake up. [crying]
translation.ja: パグスリー 起きて

translation.en: Pugsley, wake up. [sniffles]
translation.ja: パグスリー 目を開けて

translation.en: Wake up.
translation.ja: お願いだ

translation.en: [gasps] Pugsley? Pugsley! You're alive?
translation.ja: パグスリー？ 生きてるんだね？

translation.en: [laughs] Pugsley! Oh!
translation.ja: よかった ありがとう ノーマ

translation.en: Thank you, Norma. You didn't have to help us.
translation.ja: ありがとう ノーマ 助けてくれた

translation.en: Oh, no. I did it for Pauline.
translation.ja: ポリーンのためにね

translation.en: [Pauline over speakers] Your beautiful photograph is ready to collect.
translation.ja: ステキな写真ができています

translation.en: -[whimpers] -Don't worry, buddy. It's all over now.
translation.ja: 心配ない　もう終わりだ

translation.en: There's still one more thing for us to do.
translation.ja: やり残したことがある

translation.en: [Courtney] Ugh! Let me in!
translation.ja: 入れて！

translation.en: Wait. You guys are alive? What happened to Temeluchus?
translation.ja: ヤダ　生きてたの？ テメルーカスは？

translation.en: Oh, he had a great time in the park.
translation.ja: 楽しんでたよ

translation.en: And made lots of memories.
translation.ja: 思い出もたくさん

translation.en: [screams] How am I ever gonna get myself un-banished now?
translation.ja: これじゃ 追放を解いてもらえない

translation.en: You know, I'm glad we're alive but, uh, I still really wanted that job.
translation.ja: 生きててよかったけど 仕事は欲(ほ)しかった

translation.en: Yeah, me too. Guess I'll just spend
translation.ja: 私もだよ 今後は何か違(ちが)うことを 追っかける

translation.en: another 15 years hyper-fixating on something else.
translation.ja: 今後は何か違(ちが)うことを 追っかける

translation.en: Wait, wait! Wait! Humans. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 待って 人間

translation.en: What do you want now?
translation.ja: まだ何か用？

translation.en: Don't you wanna know who got the job?
translation.ja: 仕事が欲しい？

translation.en: You tricked us. There is no job.
translation.ja: 仕事なんてウソだろ

translation.en: In this place, there's always a job going. [chuckles]
translation.ja: ここには常に仕事がある

translation.en: I tend to scare away most security guards. Put these on and you'll blend right in.
translation.ja: 警備員が足りないから これを着て紛れ込め

translation.en: You guys are like demon-buster extraordinaires. I need you guys around.
translation.ja: 悪魔(あくま)と戦う特命警備員に なってほしい

translation.en: Wouldn't we be the last people you'd want hanging around?
translation.ja: 本当に僕(ぼく)らでいいの？

translation.en: Not all demons are as friendly and forgiving as I am.
translation.ja: 私みたいな優しい悪魔(あくま)は ごく一部

translation.en: After what happened today, I feel I'm gonna need a lot of security around.
translation.ja: 今日も大変だった 警備を強化しなきゃ

translation.en: So what do you say?
translation.ja: どうする？

translation.en: -Well, to be honest… -[squeals] I got the job!
translation.ja: はっきり言うと… 仕事をもらった！

translation.en: -I got it! [laughs] -[Swati laughing over phone]
translation.ja: 仕事をもらった！

translation.en: I'll be right over to pick you up!
translation.ja: 迎(むか)えに行くわ

translation.en: -There's going to be a big party tonight. -Psst. Norma.
translation.ja: ノーマ

translation.en: -Ma, wait. See you in a minute. -Oh, I'm so--
translation.ja: ママ また後で

translation.en: Do you think we can trust her?
translation.ja: コートニーを信じる？

translation.en: Hmm. Well, she is a demon.
translation.ja: 悪魔(あくま)だよね

translation.en: I try not to judge people on appearance.
translation.ja: 見た目で判断するな

translation.en: And she did try to sacrifice us.
translation.ja: 私たちをひどい目に

translation.en: Or experience. Or deep-seated gut instincts.
translation.ja: 過去や直感でも判断するな

translation.en: Anyhow, Mom's coming to pick me up for celebration tacos.
translation.ja: ところで これから タコスで祝うけど―

translation.en: [chuckles] Uh, wanna come with me, Barney?
translation.ja: バーニーもどう？

translation.en: Hey! You remembered my name.
translation.ja: 名前を覚えてくれた

translation.en: Don't make it weird. Uh, so what do you say?
translation.ja: 当たり前じゃん あなたも来る？

translation.en: My whole family's going out for dinner. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 家族で祝うの おばあちゃんもね

translation.en: Even my grandma. Uh, wanna come?
translation.ja: 家族で祝うの おばあちゃんもね 一緒(いっしょ)にどう？

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna stick around here for just a little bit.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)はもう少しここにいる

translation.en: Maybe get a shift in right away. For the overtime.
translation.ja: 残業代がもらえるかも

translation.en: -You have fun, partner. -[gasps]
translation.ja: 楽しんでね　相棒

translation.en: Don't suppose this place has any bedrooms?
translation.ja: 寝室(しんしつ)はあるかな

translation.en: Whoa!
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: So, my liege… [chuckles nervously]
translation.ja: 魔王(まおう)様 今日のことは―

translation.en: Sorry about that. No, uh… No hard feelings.
translation.ja: 謝(あやま)ります どうかお許しください

translation.en: Hmm. There's a bit of you missing.
translation.ja: 魔王(まおう)様の一部がない

translation.en: Where did that go?
translation.ja: どこにいった？

translation.en: [Barney] Ah, it's perfect. For tonight, at least.
translation.ja: これで寝(ね)ればいい

translation.en: Oh, how thoughtless of me. Here you go.
translation.ja: お前を忘れてた ほら

translation.en: Ah! A place of our own. Just like I said.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)らだけで暮らそう

translation.en: [yawns] Night-night, Pugsley.
translation.ja: おやすみ パグスリー

translation.en: [Pugsley] Night-night, Barney.
translation.ja: おやすみ バーニー
